item.description:
Let's try this place again.

It's the standard Stump format but how many places can say they have a riverfront view from their deck?

They have a new host who begins the game at 7:30, so be sure to come around a little earlier so that we can find seating and things. We will be splitting into 2 teams.

Saying you aren't any good at trivia is no excuse not to come out. Do you watch TV? Movies? Listen to Music? Eat? Know a little history? Geography?

Every little bit helps and great conversation is guaranteed.

If you know your music, even better.

Game should start around 7:30 and runs for about 2 hours!

See you there.

http://www.thewhiskeyrepublic.com/


**** Try to get down there earlier, by at least 7:15 so that we can be seated. Any winnings will be applied to a future event.
item.name: Trivia @The Whiskey Republic (keep the lights on edition)
